amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used to provide assistance to Pakistan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 36 printed in House Report 114-623 to prohibit funds in the bill from being used to provide assistance to Pakistan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 84 - 336 (Roll no. 325).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 84 - 336 (Roll no. 325).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Rohrabacher.
